amendment.description: To require a report on vehicle-based active protection systems for certain battlefield threats.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4501 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4501 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6351) To require a report on vehicle-based active protection systems for certain battlefield threats.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4501 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4501 proposed by Senator Warner.
